name: Morning (Dylan Ilvento)
description:
Made as our submission for Global Game Jam 2016's theme of “Ritual," play as your average white collar worker getting ready for their day of work, trying to complete each task of your morning routine before having to leave at 8:30 a.m.

Complete all nine minigames to prepare yourself for a day the office: take a shower, tie your shoes, check outside for the weather. See how you succeed – or fail – at each task.

Once you've completed your morning ritual, drive to work to find out how the rest of your day went.

Dan Cotting // Art & Music
Alex Rice // Art
Mason Brown // Art
John Goldhammer // Code & Art
Dylan Ilvento // Code
